name: Pathway
description:
Pathway is a tool for rapid usability tests: it helps to get actionable insights on your product before the development stage.


Create a test, import your Figma prototype (or use any other methodologies, like First Click testing or Preference), send a link to your testers (or hire testers on Pathway) and get test results with comprehensive analytics in a matter of minutes.


This plugin helps to import your prototype to the Pathway.


How it works:


  1. Create a test on Pathway (pthwy.design)
  2. Add a Figma block
  3. Import prototype using the plugin and paste your unique prototype code inside the Figma block


Learn more on pthwy.design
